title: Bachelor's of Science in Industrial Engineering
description:
Coursework includes: 
- Object-Oriented Design 
- Medical Physiology 
- BioMedical Optics 
- Human Machine Systems
- Quality Assurance
- Stochasic Modeling
- Electrical Engineering  Fundamentals
- Computer Science Fundamentals

title: Diffuse Optical Tomography
description: Diffuse Optical Tomography (DOT) simulates light passing through a 2D matrix of heterogenouse tissue using montecarlo simulation. Created for BioMedical Optics.

title: Procedural Lung Airway 3D model generation for respiratory simulation
description: Procedurally generated 3D models of lungs using pythonVTK library.

title: Master's of Science in Computer Science
org: Northeastern University Khoury College of Computer Sciences
description:
Coursework includes: 
- Programming Design Paradigms 
- Algorithms 
- Computer Systems 
- Computer Graphics 
- Database Management Systems 
- Computer Networking
- Web Development

title: Investment Simulation using Alpha Vantage API in MVC structure
description: Source code available upon request. Course project for Programming Design Paradigms.

title: Modern OpenGL "Marching Cubes" volumetric renderer
description: Source code available upon request. Course project for Computer Graphics

title: Computer Systems Research Assistant
description: Study lightweight performance monitoring solutions under assistant professor Xiang Ren

title: Backend Software Engineer Intern
description: I worked on back end data processing for the Delsys ElectroMyography (EMG) sensor pipeline as well as API integration points and demo examples

title: Systems SQA Engineer II
description: Developed requirements and test protocols for web platforms, telemetry solutions, and diagnostic tools while also performing root cause analysis on bugs I found along the way. Competancies include: API testing, ISO 13485 Quality Management Systems, requirement/risk analysis, and AWS Cloud Infrastructure.

title: CQV Consultant
description: Delivered BioPharmaceutical turnover packages to clients during manufacturing site startup. I worked directly with my Clients, General Contractors, and Specialists to develop system boundaries, user requirements, Failure Modes and Effects Analysis, Enginering Test Protocols and Reports (including Commissioning, Qualification, and Validation). Systems I worked on directly include Facilities, HVAC, Autoclave, Process Gases

title: Quality Assurance Engineer Intern
description: I helped manage the quality management system documentation and develop protocols and user requirements for systems like a Computerized Maintenance Management System

title: Quality Engineer Intern
description: Developed and executed medical hardware and software validation protocols. Generated Non-Conforming Material Reports and updated documentation for international medical device standards.

title: 3D Visualization Quality Assurance Intern
description: Developed image manipulation scripts for catalog imagery and streamlined 3D rendering pipeline standards.
